snippet: Gerrie Nel, whose cross-examinations have earned him the nickname pit bull, has turned his judicial laser on Oscar Pistorius, who is charged in the murder of his girlfriend.
abstract: Gerrie Nel, South African prosecutor nicknamed 'Pit Bull' for his aggressive cross-examination tactics, has come into spotlight during murder trial of Oscar Pistorius; colleagues say that Nel's relentless and sometimes brutal method is not unusual in South Africa, but he has nonetheless received warnings for his treatment of Pistorius, who is beginning his second week of testimony.
lead_paragraph: Gerrie Nel, whose cross-examinations have earned him the nickname pit bull, has turned his judicial laser on Oscar Pistorius, who is charged in the murder of his girlfriend.

headline.main: Pistorius Versus the Pit Bull: Fierce Prosecutor Shares Stage
headline.print_headline: Pistorius Versus the Pit Bull: Fierce Prosecutor Shares Stage
